title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind spreading chaos in Gotham City.

title: Inglourious Basterds
description: A group of Jewish soldiers plot to assassinate Nazi leaders in occupied France.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and redemption.

title: Breaking Bad
description: A chemistry teacher turns into a drug kingpin after a cancer diagnosis.

title: Game of Thrones
description: Noble families fight for control of the Iron Throne.

title: Stranger Things
description: Kids uncover supernatural mysteries in their small town.

title: The Mandalorian
description: A lone bounty hunter travels through the outer reaches of the galaxy.

title: Peaky Blinders
description: A gangster family rises to power in post-war England.

title: Fight Club
description: An underground fight club becomes something much more.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The story of a man with a low IQ who achieves great things.

title: The Social Network
description: The founding of Facebook and the legal battles that followed.
